Text: SEED PLEASE HOW ARE WE EXPECTED TO DOWNLOAD IF YOU DON'T UPLOAD WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH PEOPLE ON THIS SITE LATELY?

I've been seeding since I uploaded, the trackers are screwed up, so it says that there arent seeders when there are, I had a thread on superbay to find this out, so I'm not just talking smack.But there does seem to be a lot of downloaders that just download then remove and not seed.
I seed till I see at least 20 other seeders before I remove it from my Bit Torrent to make room for new ones.
Come on guys, I've seen over 50 leechers on multiple torrents at different times, and yet they do not have the courtesy to seed for at least a day after downloading, thats just not right people !!!
maybe some of us dont like to be tracked :P
